_comment1: Enter data as [var1_lower_bound var1_upper bound], [var2_lower_bound var2_upper bound]. NVARS is auto determined.
_comment2: Skips Elitist if 'Elitist' is set to 0
_comment3: Default is 'RandomSelection'. Can be changed to 'TournamentSelection'
_comment4: You can control what is printed on console. Accepted: 'ERROR', 'INFO', 'DEBUG'
_comment5: Set PlotData to 1 to get Generations vs Fitness plot. Needs matplotlib library
